1 /**
  2  * Emily
  3  * Copyright(c) 2012 Olivier Scherrer <pode.fr@gmail.com>
  4  * MIT Licensed
  5  */
  6 
  7 define("Store", ["Observable", "Tools"],
  8 /** 
  9  * @class
 10  * Store creates a small NoSQL database with observables
 11  * It can publish events on store/data changes
 12  */
 13  function Store(Observable, Tools) {
 14 	
 15 	/**
 16 	 * Defines the Store
 17 	 * @private
 18 	 * @param values
 19 	 * @returns
 20 	 */
 21 	return function StoreConstructor($data) {
 22 		
 23 		/**
 24 		 * Where the data is stored
 25 		 * @private
 26 		 */
 27 		var _data = Tools.clone($data) || {},
 28 		
 29 		/**
 30 		 * The observable
 31 		 * @private
 32 		 */
 33 		_storeObservable = new Observable(),
 34 		
 35 		_valueObservable = new Observable(),
 36 		
 37 		/**
 38 		 * Gets the difference between two objects and notifies them
 39 		 * @private
 40 		 * @param previousData
 41 		 * @returns
 42 		 */
 43 		_notifyDiffs = function _notifyDiffs(previousData) {
 44 			var diffs = Tools.objectsDiffs(previousData, _data);
 45 			["updated",
 46 			 "deleted",
 47 			 "added"].forEach(function (value) {
 48 				 diffs[value].forEach(function (dataIndex) {
 49 						_storeObservable.notify(value, dataIndex, _data[dataIndex]);
 50 						_valueObservable.notify(dataIndex, _data[dataIndex], value);
 51 				 });
 52 			});
 53 		};
 54 		
 55 		/**
 56 		 * Get the number of items in the store
 57 		 * @returns {Number} the number of items in the store
 58 		 */
 59 		this.getNbItems = function() {
 60 			return _data instanceof Array ? _data.length : Tools.count(_data);
 61 		};
 62 		
 63 		/**
 64 		 * Get a value from its index
 65 		 * @param {String} name the name of the index
 66 		 * @returns the value
 67 		 */
 68 		this.get = function get(name) {
 69 			return _data[name];
 70 		};
 71 		
 72 		/**
 73 		 * Checks if the store has a given value
 74 		 * @param {String} name the name of the index
 75 		 * @returns {Boolean} true if the value exists
 76 		 */
 77 		this.has = function has(name) {
 78 			return _data.hasOwnProperty(name);
 79 		};
 80 		
 81 		/**
 82 		 * Set a new value and overrides an existing one
 83 		 * @param {String} name the name of the value
 84 		 * @param value the value to assign
 85 		 * @returns true if value is set
 86 		 */
 87 		this.set = function set(name, value) {
 88 			var ante,
 89 				action;
 90 			
 91 			if (typeof name != "undefined") {
 92 				ante = this.has(name);
 93 				_data[name] = value;
 94 				action = ante ? "updated" : "added";
 95 				_storeObservable.notify(action, name, _data[name]);	
 96 				_valueObservable.notify(name, _data[name], action);
 97 				return true;
 98 			} else {
 99 				return false;
100 			}
101 		};
102 		
103 		/**
104 		 * Delete value from its index
105 		 * @param {String} name the name of the index from which to delete the value
106 		 * @returns true if successfully deleted.
107 		 */
108 		this.del = function del(name) {
109 			if (this.has(name)) {
110 				if (!this.alter("splice", name, 1)) {
111 					delete _data[name];
112 					_storeObservable.notify("deleted", name);
113 					_valueObservable.notify(name, _data[name], "deleted");
114 				}
115 				return true;
116 			} else {
117 				return false;
118 			}
119 		};
120 		
121 		/**
122 		 * Alter the data be calling one of it's method
123 		 * When the modifications are done, it notifies on changes.
124 		 * @param {String} func the name of the method
125 		 * @returns the result of the method call
126 		 */
127 		this.alter = function alter(func) {
128 			var apply,
129 				previousData;
130 			
131 			if (_data[func]) {
132 				previousData = Tools.clone(_data);
133 				apply = _data[func].apply(_data, Array.prototype.slice.call(arguments, 1));
134 				_notifyDiffs(previousData);
135 				return apply;
136 			} else {
137 				return false;
138 			}
139 		};
140 		
141 		/**
142 		 * Watch the store's modifications
143 		 * @param {String} added/updated/deleted
144 		 * @param {Function} func the function to execute
145 		 * @param {Object} scope the scope in which to execute the function
146 		 * @returns {Handler} the subscribe's handler to use to stop watching
147 		 */
148 		this.watch = function watch(name, func, scope) {
149 			return _storeObservable.watch(name, func, scope);
150 		};
151 		
152 		/**
153 		 * Unwatch the store modifications
154 		 * @param {Handler} handler the handler returned by the watch function
155 		 * @returns
156 		 */
157 		this.unwatch = function unwatch(handler) {
158 			return _storeObservable.unwatch(handler);
159 		};
160 		
161 		/**
162 		 * Get the observable used for watching store's modifications
163 		 * Should be used only for debugging
164 		 * @returns {Observable} the Observable
165 		 */
166 		this.getStoreObservable = function getStoreObservable() {
167 			return _storeObservable;
168 		};
169 		
170 		/**
171 		 * Watch a value's modifications
172 		 * @param {String} name the name of the value to watch for
173 		 * @param {Function} func the function to execute
174 		 * @param {Object} scope the scope in which to execute the function
175 		 * @returns true if unwatched
176 		 */
177 		this.watchValue = function watchValue(name, func, scope) {
178 			return _valueObservable.watch(name, func, scope);
179 		};
180 		
181 		/**
182 		 * Unwatch the value's modifications
183 		 * @param {Handler} handler the handler returned by the watchValue function
184 		 * @returns true if unwatched
185 		 */
186 		this.unwatchValue = function unwatchValue(handler) {
187 			return _valueObservable.unwatch(handler);
188 		};
189 		
190 		/**
191 		 * Get the observable used for watching value's modifications
192 		 * Should be used only for debugging
193 		 * @returns {Observable} the Observable
194 		 */
195 		this.getValueObservable = function getValueObservable() {
196 			return _valueObservable;
197 		};
198 
199 		/**
200 		 * Loop through the data
201 		 * @param {Function} func the function to execute on each data
202 		 * @param {Object} scope the scope in wich to run the callback
203 		 */
204 		this.loop = function loop(func, scope) {
205 			Tools.loop(_data, func, scope);
206 		};
207 		
208 		/**
209 		 * Reset all data and get notifications on changes
210 		 * @param {Arra/Object} data the new data
211 		 * @returns {Boolean}
212 		 */
213 		this.reset = function reset(data) {
214 			if (data instanceof Object) {
215 				var previousData = Tools.clone(_data);
216 				_data = Tools.clone(data) || {};
217 				_notifyDiffs(previousData);
218 				return true;
219 			} else {
220 				return false;
221 			}
222 
223 		};
224 		
225 		/**
226 		 * Dumps a JSON version of all the data
227 		 * @returns {JSON}
228 		 */
229 		this.toJSON = function toJSON() {
230 			return JSON.stringify(_data);
231 		};
232 	};
233 });
